attributes.action: Cycle path between Middlesbrough and Guisborough
attributes.additional_details:
Guisborough has an estimated population of 22000 yet there is no cycle path to middlesbrough, instead cyclists are having to use the very busy A171 dual carriage way.

A cycle path exists for part of the way, a link is needed from Dixons Bank to Guisborough town a distance of only six miles. Redcar and Cleveland Council have looked at this but no plans are being considered.
